あう.example_vni: Hôm nay, tôi gặp gỡ bạn.

あおい.vni: màu xanh (xanh da trời, xanh lá)

あそぶ.eng: to play, to make a visit

ある.eng: to be,to have (used for inanimate objects)

いる1.eng: to be, to have (used for people and animals)

きく.eng: to hear, to listen to, to ask

きる2.eng: to put on from the shoulders down

くもる.eng: to become cloudy, to become dim

けす.eng: to erase, to turn off power

さす.eng: to stretch out hands, to raise an umbrella

とる2.eng: to take a photo or record a film

ならぶ.eng: to line up, stand in a line

ねる.eng: to go to bed, to sleep

はく.eng: to wear, to put on trousers

みっか.eng: third day of month, three days
